data.oai_dc:dc: This data package contains simulated genetic marker data (diallelic SNPs) that has been used to show the effects of Isolation by Distance on several widely used statistical inferences. The data has been simulate dusing the programs Marlin (Meirmans 2011) and QuantiNemo (Neuenschwander et al. 2008). For more information on the data contents and format, please consult the ReadMe file.
Adaptation|Population Genetics - Empirical|Population Genetics - Theoretical|Landscape Genetics|Ecological Genetics
